an3.80:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an3.80:1.2: “sammukhā metaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ:
an3.80:1.3: ‘bhagavato, ānanda, sikhissa abhibhū nāma sāvako brahmaloke ṭhito sahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpesī’ti.
an3.80:1.4: Bhagavā pana, bhante, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho kīvatakaṃ pahoti sarena viññāpetun”ti?
an3.80:2.1: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an3.80:2.2: “sammukhā metaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ:
an3.80:2.3: ‘bhagavato, ānanda, sikhissa abhibhū nāma sāvako brahmaloke ṭhito sahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpesī’ti.
an3.80:2.4: Bhagavā pana, bhante, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho kīvatakaṃ pahoti sarena viññāpetun”ti?
an3.80:3.1: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an3.80:3.2: “sammukhā metaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ:
an3.80:3.3: ‘bhagavato, ānanda, sikhissa abhibhū nāma sāvako brahmaloke ṭhito sahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpesī’ti.
an3.80:3.4: Bhagavā pana, bhante, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho kīvatakaṃ pahoti sarena viññāpetun”ti?
an3.80:3.7: yaṃ bhagavā bhāseyya. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
an3.80:3.9: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
an3.80:4.1: “Yāvatā, ānanda, candimasūriyā pariharanti, disā bhanti virocanā, tāva sahassadhā loko.
an3.80:4.2: Tasmiṃ sahassadhā loke sahassaṃ candānaṃ, sahassaṃ sūriyānaṃ, sahassaṃ sinerupabbatarājānaṃ, sahassaṃ jambudīpānaṃ, sahassaṃ aparagoyānānaṃ, sahassaṃ uttarakurūnaṃ, sahassaṃ pubbavidehānaṃ, cattāri mahāsamuddasahassāni, cattāri mahārājasahassāni, sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ, sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ, sahassaṃ yāmānaṃ, sahassaṃ tusitānaṃ, sahassaṃ nimmānaratīnaṃ, sahassaṃ paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ, sahassaṃ brahmalokānaṃ—
an3.80:5.1: Yāvatānanda, sahassī cūḷanikā lokadhātu tāva sahassadhā loko.
an3.80:6.1: Yāvatānanda, dvisahassī majjhimikā lokadhātu tāva sahassadhā loko.
an3.80:7.1: Ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, tathāgato tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpeyya, yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti.
an3.80:8.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana, bhante, bhagavā tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpeyya, yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti?
an3.80:8.3: Yadā te sattā taṃ ālokaṃ sañjāneyyuṃ, atha tathāgato ghosaṃ kareyya saddamanussāveyya.
an3.80:8.4: Evaṃ kho, ānanda, tathāgato tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpeyya, yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti.
an3.80:9.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca:
an3.80:9.4: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an3.80:9.5: “kiṃ tuyhettha, āvuso ānanda, yadi te satthā evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo”ti?
an3.80:9.6: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca:
an3.80:9.8: Sace, udāyi, ānando avītarāgo kālaṃ kareyya, tena cittappasādena sattakkhattuṃ devesu devarajjaṃ kāreyya, sattakkhattuṃ imasmiṃyeva jambudīpe mahārajjaṃ kāreyya.
an3.80:9.9: Api ca, udāyi, ānando diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyissatī”ti.
